title: [Cancer] Sugar sweetened soda is associated with increased liver cancer risk among persons without diabetes. Artificially sweetened soda is associated with increased liver cancer risk among persons with diabetes. The risk of liver cancer was evident in the first 12 years of follow-up.
[Medicine] Minoxidil a common hair loss treatment also known as (Rogaine) is shown to decrease collagen production in the body. The findings have never been listed as a side effect on the medicine.
